# Render Plot

```{r plot-options, echo=FALSE}
selectInput(inputId="plotColumn",
            label="Choose a column:",
            choices=names(mtcars)
)
sliderInput(inputId="breaks",
            label="Choose number of breaks:",
            min=5,
            max=50,
            value=30
)
```

```{r render-plot, echo=FALSE}
renderPlot(hist(mtcars[, input$plotColumn], breaks=input$breaks))
```
